item.title: Help with custom items
item.dc:creator: @Cory.Sanders1 Cory.Sanders1
item.description:
@Cory.Sanders1 wrote:

Ok so what in this code tells it to look like a guthans helm?

if (i == 15007) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 10394; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 22463; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 6020; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 6020; class8.anInt174 = 6583; class8.anInt181 = 860; class8.anInt190 = 2012; class8.anInt198 = 188; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 17; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 6653; class8.anInt200 = 6687; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = 6570; class8.anInt197 = 6575; class8.aString170 = "Green Helm"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Green helm".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
